issue.title: "swappable" undefined for swapping lvalue and rvalue

blockquote.p: An rvalue or lvalue t is swappable if and only if t is swappable with any rvalue or lvalue, respectively, of type T.

discussion.p:
This paragraph seems to establish two disjoint definitions of "swappable" — one for lvalues and one for rvalues — with neither definition including the case of swapping an rvalue with an lvalue.
Resolution proposal:
Delete the word "respectively".

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N3376.

blockquote.p: An rvalue or lvalue t is swappable if and only if t is swappable with any rvalue or lvalue , respectively, of type T.
